header.title: TypEr Release Notes

chapter.p: This document describes the changes made to TypEr.

item.p: Added COPYRIGHT.txt and updated copyright years
Added 'nowarn_export_all' option to avoid compile warnings for test suite with OTP-20.0 and later.
Split out from OTP repo and converted to use rebar3
Fix a bug that could result in a crash when printing warnings onto standard error.
Properly extract annotations from core code.
The name of a compiler option has been fixed in the Makefile.
Added initial documentation framework for TypEr.
Major rewrite; all code has been cleaned up and placed in one file. The only reason why this is not version 1.0 yet is that there is no proper documentation.
Added ability to receive the set of exported types and report unknown ones.

Added two undocumented options that may come very handy when trying to understand why typer reports some particular set of types for the functions in a module. These options are mainly for typer developers at this point, but may become documented in some future version.
Better handling of overloaded contracts; especially erroneous ones on which typer does not crash anymore.
Fixed problem that caused typer to hang when given a file whose module name did not correspond to the file name.
